content:
From: Gerwin.Klein@data61.csiro.au
As Makarius announced yesterday, the release fork for Isabelle2018 has happened now.

The release fork for AFP-2018 will be on Tuesday midday (CET). Please push any changes you have to your entries for the AFP-2018 release by then.

Further changes after the release fork will go into the next release unless there is a specific reason to do otherwise. Please email me directly for such cases.

Any changes have to work with the Isabelle repository at https://isabelle.sketis.net/repos/isabelle-release (currently at revision 89e05bd572c)

Cheers,
Gerwin
